scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c "yellow.bold","magenta.bold" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c "yellow.bold","magenta.bold" "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
